formula: a(n) ~ n! * 2^(n+2) * (cos(Pi*n/2) * log(cosh(Pi/2)) + arctan(sinh(Pi/2)) * sin(Pi*n/2)) / Pi^(n+1). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015
mathematica: Log[ 1+Sin[ x ] ]/Cosh[ x ]CoefficientList[Series[Log[1 + Sin[x]]*Sech[x], {x, 0, 20}], x] * Range[0, 20]! (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015 *)
